analysis.key_quote: This proposal brings us all the closer to an autocracy/oligarchy and I urge everyone to stand against this.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of checks and balances, due process rights for federal employees, and the potential for increased politicization of the civil service. These themes align with a defense of the current merit-based system and protections for employee rights.
